title:
Hamming and Symbol-Pair Distances of Constacyclic Codes of Length $2p^s$
  over $\frac{\mathbb{F}_{p^m}[u, v]}{\langle u^2, v^2, uv-vu\rangle}$
authors: Divya Acharya, Prasanna Poojary, Vadiraja Bhatta G R
abstract:
Let $p$ be an odd prime. In this paper, we have determined the Hamming
distances for constacyclic codes of length $2p^s$ over the finite commutative
non-chain ring $\mathcal{R}=\frac{\mathbb{F}_{p^m}[u, v]}{\langle u^2, v^2,
uv-vu\rangle}$. Also their symbol-pair distances are completely obtained.
